articles.title: Only 5 African countries may fully vaccinate 40% of population by year-end - WHO Africa - SowetanLIVE
articles.description: Only five African countries will meet the target of fully vaccinating 40% of their populations against COVID-19 unless the pace of inoculations accelerates across the continent, World Health Organization said on Thursday.
